1516ec34202a21239aa8275d5637007d4c2c54ad.query:
SELECT
                ID,
                comment,
                owner,
                created,
                gist_public_id
            FROM
                gists_comments_view
            WHERE
                gist_public_id = $1
            ORDER BY created;

1ea7ea0bb1a6f4b84a2b9c6b1741c6bf9f1938f1.query:
INSERT INTO gists_comments (owner_id, gist_id, comment, created)
            VALUES (
                (SELECT ID FROM gists_users WHERE username = $1),
                (SELECT ID FROM gists_gists WHERE public_id = $2),
                $3,
                $4
            )

340413dd6062e88bf2db846a05f600d6d0384f8b.query:
DELETE FROM gists_gists 
        WHERE 
            public_id = $1
        AND
            owner_id = (SELECT ID FROM gists_users WHERE username = $2)

38409cc4e1e1edf0a5f15160d54a59b741fc6687.query:
SELECT
                owner,
                visibility,
                created,
                updated,
                public_id,
                description
            FROM
                gists_gists_view
            WHERE public_id = $1

405772009a7aee0194b6b25c42955c2674c3ff92.query: SELECT password  FROM gists_users WHERE username = ($1)

        WHERE username = $2

        WHERE username = $2

9e09535aa7dd7be208c23776acd97e418cb6a2dc.query:

        (username , password, email, secret) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)

a123bde2c6da21bc9b98036b4c68c34dc5e1fbe7.query:

                ID,
                comment,
                owner,
                created,

            FROM

            WHERE

aa899a667f05d021e1d537f1ab53289edcec5fc7.query:

        WHERE username = $2

c2ab0ea9f4f409a089d9bf845a6102d7acae88fa.query:
INSERT INTO gists_gists 
        (owner_id , description, public_id, visibility, created, updated)
        VALUES (
            (SELECT ID FROM gists_users WHERE username = $1),
            $2, $3, (SELECT ID FROM gists_visibility WHERE name = $4), $5, $6
        )

cc05f1d7f840a39b445abc687e904f7ef0633a63.query: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 from gists_visibility WHERE name = $1)

d5ad01498e65415f65a3c30e327b60c61b016a89.query:
DELETE FROM gists_comments
                    WHERE
                        ID = $1
                    AND
                        owner_id = (SELECT ID FROM gists_users WHERE username = $2)

d96deddee5298f86c6938eeb12ee6ad130a2d621.query:

                owner,
                visibility,
                created,
                updated,
                public_id,
                description
            FROM
                gists_gists_view
            WHERE owner = $1
